game.name: Dreadway
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 한 무리의 사람들이 기차 안에서 핵종말 이후 살아남기 위해 협동하는 공포 게임으로, 기차를 업그레이드하기 위해 여러 잡동사니를 찾아다니는 내용입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op extraction horror about surviving a nuclear apocalypse as a small group of people on a train, scavenging for various scrap to upgrade the train and use your voice for surviving.
